name: Lumberjack Legacy: Beyond the Wall
description: This is a game that I made for Ninja Game Jam #4. It's a top down 2D Rogue-lite created in the Unity Engine. You play as a lumberjack who leaves the safety of the walls of the city to cut down trees in the forest. This game is serving as a prototype for a game that I want to make in the future, so please leave me a comment to let me know what you think! Thanks!
